hive.model.energy.energysource module¶

class hive.model.energy.energysource.EnergySource[source]¶

Bases: tuple

A tuple to represent an energy source. Can be of a unique energy type (i.e. electirc, gasoline, etc)

Parameters

  • powercurve_id (PowercurveId) – The id of the powercurve this energy source will use.

  • energy_type (EnergySource) – The energy type of this energy source.

  • ideal_energy_limit (kwh) – Refueling is considered complete when this energy limit is reached.

  • capacity (kwh) – The total energy capacity of the energy source.

  • energy (kwh) – The current energy level of the energy source.

  • max_charge_acceptance_kw (kw) – The maximum charge acceptance this energy source can handle (electric only)

  • charge_threshold (kwh) – A threshold parameter to allow for some floating point error.

energy_type¶
ideal_energy_limit¶

property soc¶

calculates the current state of charge as a Ratio

is_at_ideal_energy_limit()[source]¶

True if the EnergySource is at ideal energy limit

Return type

bool

Returns

True, if the energy level is equal to or greater than the ideal energy limit,

within some epsilon, considering that charging curves can prevent reaching this ideal value.

not_at_ideal_energy_limit()[source]¶

True if the EnergySource is not at ideal energy limit

Return type

bool

Returns
